Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Worked in law enforcement?
Value: Volunteered as a drill instructor for junior police

Heading: Types of jobs worked
Value: Worked in father’s bakery when not serving his one weekend a month in Army Reserves

Heading: Marital status
Value: Married - though wife divorced 2 years after his conviction

Heading: Diagnosis
Value: Bipolar-effective disorder (diagnosis made by psychiatrist when Hansen was arrested for stealing a chainsaw)

Heading: Committed previous crimes?
Value: Yes - set fire to school bus garage, caught stealing several times

Heading: Spend time in prison?
Value: Yes - sentenced to 3 years in prison for fire, served only 20 months, sentenced to 5 years for stealing a chainsaw, served only 1 year

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Type of serial killer
Value: Organized lust- organized serial killer, well-planned, targeted strangers

Heading: How close did killer live?
Value: Flew victims to isolated hunting cabin

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Weapon
Value: Killer brought with him- rifle, 22 caliber pistol

Heading: Rape?
Value: Yes; had women perform oral sex on him, reported 30 rapes

Heading: Tortured victims?
Value: Yes- handcuffed, blind-folded, make victims take clothes off and perform sexual activities

Heading: Took totem – personal item
Value: Business cards, necklaces, pearl rings, fish charms

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Value: Sometimes, most times he tried to conceal

Heading: Left at scene, hidden
Value: Threw in lake and weighed down with gravel
